overview:
A Real Time Informational Website

LEAKITOUT.com founded by Alexander De Jong serves as a gateway and a stage for â€œReal Timeâ€ information transforming everyday people into reporters and judges. There are no editors or revisions only visitors commenting on common events. LeakItOut.com forges a link among everyone in the world, every second, every hour and every day.

By allowing multiple parties to post their version of what people witness, users receive a 360 degree view of what really happened, removing the biased â€œfactsâ€ competitors and other news outlets portray. No governmental agency or editor with a given philosophy can control the views of people. LeakItOut.com is news of the people by the people and for the people. We strive to bring all people in the world closer together in understanding and addressing world-wide issues.

Leakitout.com allows users to post information from a â€œmobile deviceâ€ or â€œPCâ€ literally within seconds something happens. Once information is posted on LeakItOut.com, users may search by keyword, city, state, country or the world for information. Having first-hand accounts of what happened on the scene according to the observerâ€™s viewpoint allows visitors to the website an opportunity to review a plethora of unedited fresh inputs from different contributors of what is occurring. This particularly adds value since in any significant event there may be dozens or more observers, each with different viewpoints. In other words LeakItOut.com provides â€œtrue newsâ€ source unlike any other that exists.
